import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const Dashboard = ({ demoMode, backendOnline }) => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ teachers: 0, classrooms: 0, subjects: 0, timetables: 0 }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); // Always use demo data for now setStats({ teachers: 4, classrooms: 6, subjects: 10, timetables: 1 }); } catch (error) { console.error('Dashboard error:', error); // Fallback to demo data setStats({ teachers: 4, classrooms: 6, subjects: 10, timetables: 1 }); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon, color }) => (

{title}

{loading ? '...' : value}

); return (

This is a fully functional demo of the NEP 2020 Timetable Generator. You can explore teachers, classrooms, subjects, and generate timetables. All data is pre-loaded for demonstration.

); }; export default Dashboard;
